d.description: The embedded InterVariable.ttf reports family name 'Inter Variable' not 'Inter'. Updated fallback stack and system font mapping.
d.title: Fix font name mismatch: Inter → Inter Variable

d.description: Added Helvetica, DejaVu Sans, Segoe UI, Arial as fallbacks after Inter Variable so font resolution never panics.
d.title: Add system font fallbacks to prevent panic

d.description: Parley glyph_run.baseline() was being added to glyph y-positions, then paint_line added its own baseline offset. Removed parley baseline from ShapedGlyph.position.y.
d.title: Fix double-counted baseline in glyph positioning

d.description: Added visual debug sections with colored containers to verify line height, text sizing, and baseline positioning. Moved example to examples/feature/text.rs.
d.title: Add box model debug sections to text example

d.description: Audit and fix pub(crate) items that need to become pub when crossing the gpui_core boundary. Partially done — color, geometry, shared_string, shared_uri all handled. Remaining modules still in main crate.
Rename gpui-ce to gesso across the entire project: crate names, repo, crates.io, docs, licensing
d.name: rename-to-gesso

d.description: Publish a minimal placeholder crate to secure the name before starting the rename. Can be a 0.0.1 with just a lib.rs and description.
d.title: Reserve 'gesso' crate name on crates.io

d.description: Change package name from gpui-ce to gesso. Update description, repository URL, homepage, keywords. Keep Apache-2.0 license.
d.title: Update root Cargo.toml package name and metadata

d.description: Update crates/gpui_core to crates/gesso_core. Update its Cargo.toml name, the workspace members list, and all dependency references.
d.title: Rename gpui_core crate to gesso_core

d.description: Update the proc-macro crate name from gpui_macros to gesso_macros. Update all references in Cargo.toml dependencies and use statements.
d.title: Rename gpui_macros crate to gesso_macros

d.description: Replace gpui/gpui_core/gpui_macros with gesso/gesso_core/gesso_macros across all source files. Includes use statements, extern crate, cfg attributes, doc comments.
d.title: Update all internal crate references and imports

d.description: Rename lib entry point src/gpui.rs to src/gesso.rs. Update the [lib] path in Cargo.toml. Check for any other files with gpui in the name.
d.title: Rename source files (gpui.rs -> gesso.rs)

d.description: Keep original Zed Industries Apache-2.0 copyright. Add new copyright line for gesso. Update any references to gpui-ce in license headers or notices.
d.title: Update license and attribution

d.description: Update all example files and test files that reference gpui-ce or gpui to use the new gesso name. Ensure examples compile and tests pass.
d.title: Update examples and tests

d.description: Rewrite README.md for gesso identity. Update any doc comments referencing gpui by name. Update homepage/repo links.
d.title: Update documentation and README

d.description: Update any GitHub Actions workflows, build scripts (script/), and tooling that reference gpui-ce or gpui crate names.
d.title: Update CI/CD and scripts

d.description: Create github.com/gesso (or similar org/repo). Update git remotes. Set up redirects or archive notice on old repo if applicable.
d.title: Create new GitHub repo and update remotes

d.description: Final publish of gesso and gesso_core to crates.io. Verify all dependency names resolve. Yank or deprecate gpui-ce crate with pointer to gesso.
d.title: Publish gesso to crates.io
